jpacman.model
Class Food

java.lang.Object
  jpacman.model.Guest
      jpacman.model.Food

public class Food
extends Guest

Food having a number of calories, which can occupy a cell on the board.

Version:
$Id: Food.java,v 1.9 2008/02/07 12:46:27 arie Exp $
Author:
Arie van Deursen; Jul 28, 2003

Method Detail

foodInvariant

public boolean foodInvariant()
Whatever happens, the amount of food is non-negative.

Returns:
True iff the food is non-negative and the guest's super invariant holds as well.

getPoints

public int getPoints()
Provide the number of calories for this piece of food.

Returns:
Points of this food element.

meetPlayer

protected boolean meetPlayer(PlayerMove theMove)
The player wants to eat this food cell. Modify the move's state to reflect the effect this would have. Precondition: the move is in its initialization stage.

Specified by:
meetPlayer in class Guest
Parameters:
theMove - the move the player intends to do.
Returns:
True, since such a move is possible.
See Also:
Guest.meetPlayer(jpacman.model.PlayerMove)
